fn.p: Financial Support: This study was suported by Fundação de Amparo à Pesquisa do Estado de Mato Grosso (FAPEMAT /SES-MT/CNPq 002/2013 and FAPEMAT/Universal 003/2014).
Ethical Approval: The Ethics Review Committee of Júlio Müller University Hospital - Universidade Federal de Mato Grosso approved this study (approval number 288.172/2013).
